amplifier.title: Amplifier
amplifier.description: Use this device class for audio amplifier devices.

blinds.title: Blinds
blinds.description: Use this device class for blinds, both horizontal and vertical.

button.title: Button
button.description: Use this device class for buttons, and other items which do not have a state.

coffeemachine.title: Coffee machine
coffeemachine.description: Use this device class for coffee machines.

curtain.title: Curtains
curtain.description: Use this device class for curtains.

doorbell.title: Doorbell
doorbell.description: Use this device class for doorbells, usually together with the `button` capability.

fan.title: Fan
fan.description: Use this device class for fans that cool your home.

garagedoor.title: Garage door
garagedoor.description: Use this device class for garage doors as well as other automatic doors and gates.

heater.title: Heater
heater.description: Use this device class for heaters, that warm your home.

homealarm.title: Home Security
homealarm.description: Use this device class for home alarm systems.

homeenergymonitor.title: Home Energy Monitor
homeenergymonitor.description: Use this device class for devices that monitor a house's energy usage.

kettle.title: Kettle
kettle.description: Use this device class for kettle devices, that can heat water.

light.title: Light
light.description: Use this device class for lights

lock.title: Lock
lock.description: Use this device class for lock devices.

other.title: Other
other.description: Use this device class for devices that do not fit any other device class.

relay.title: Relay
relay.description: Use this device class for relays, which are connected to another device.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: Use this device class for (TV/Sunblind/Keyfob etc.) remotes.

sensor.title: Sensor
sensor.description: Use this device class for sensors, e.g. a contact or motion sensor. As well as alarms!

socket.title: Wall Plug
socket.description: Use this device class for wall plugs and sockets.

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: Use this device class for devices that can play audio, such as music.

sunshade.title: Sunshade
sunshade.description: Use this device class for sunshades (window coverings against the sun).

thermostat.title: Thermostat
thermostat.description: Use this device class for thermostats, either for the entire home or radiator-mounted.

tv.title: TV
tv.description: Use this device class for TVs.

vacuumcleaner.title: Vacuum Cleaner
vacuumcleaner.description: Use this device class for vacuum cleaners.

windowcoverings.title: Window Coverings
windowcoverings.description: Use this device class for window coverings, when the `curtains`, `blinds` or `sunshade` device class doesn't apply.

all.title: On if all on
all.description: On if all devices are on. otherwise off

any.title: On if any on
any.description: On if any devices are on

highest.title: Highest Value
highest.description: The highest value of the all the grouped device

ignore.title: Ignore Devices
ignore.description: Don't update, only use values set by the card

lowest.title: Lowest Value
lowest.description: The lowest value of the all the grouped device

max.title: Maximum value
max.description: The value of the device with the largest value

mean.title: Mean Average
mean.description: The average your are used to (sum/count)

median.title: Median Average
median.description: The value of the device in the middle

min.title: Minimum Value
min.description: The value of the device with the smallest value

mode.title: Mode Average
mode.description: The value which the most devices has

most.title: Most Devices
most.description: On if at least half devices are on

never.title: Never On
never.description: Never on, always returns to off

none.title: On unless all on
none.description: Off if all devices are on, otherwise on

sum.title: Total Value
sum.description: The sum of all the grouped device values

nor.title: On if None on
nor.description: On if all devices are off, otherwise off

xor.title: On unless all on or off
xor.description: Off when all devices are off or all devices are on
